text: Drillia cratista is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Drilliidae.Melvill, J. Cosmo. "Descriptions of eight new species of the family Turridae and of a new species of Mitra." Journal of Molluscan Studies 17.4 (1927): 149–155. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Caribbean Sea off Jamaica. ==References== ==External links== * cratista Category:Gastropods described in 1927
title: Drillia cratista
